articles.description: The extinct species, uncovered in Thailand, is keying researchers into how and when American and Chinese alligators split apart.
articles.content:
In 2005, the residents of Ban Si Lam, a village in northeastern Thailand, dug out their local pond. Amid the topsoil they found some pottery, ceramics, andto their surprisean alligator skull.
Resear… [+3062 chars]

articles.author: Steve DaSilva
articles.title: Elon Musk's Starlink Is Making Life Harder For Astronomers - Jalopnik
articles.description: Who knew clogging the sky with satellites would make it harder to see space?
articles.content: Space is a tricky thing to study. Its hard to physically go there, what with the cost and the distance and the deadly vacuum of it all, so scientists prefer to stay on terra firma and merely look out… [+2106 chars]
